item.title: 1034 AGNC
item.description: score:1034 Chances: The worst appears to be over for AGNC Investment as the Federal Reserve hiked interest rates, which may make it a worthy buy. AGNC Investment’s commitment to repositioning its portfolio in the current volatile interest rate scenario may optimize its performance.
